articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: In COVID's shadow, HIV on march in Eastern Europe - Medical Xpress
articles.description: In a Bucharest back street, drug addicts rush towards an ambulance handing out free syringes. While the eyes of the world focus on the COVID-19 pandemic, the fight against HIV has slowed down in Eastern Europe.
